casebody.data:
COLUMBUS COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES
v.
NORTON 249P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Calvin T. Norton, for Norton, Calvin T. David S. Tedder, Assistant County Attorney, for Columbus County Dept. of Social Services (Ex. Rel.), et al

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of April 2019 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
